scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c '.*/**/*.json' '.*/**/*.y*ml' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.y*ml' && poetry run isort . --check && poetry run yapf -rd docs xirvik .stubs tests
scripts.fix-pluggy: touch "$(poetry run python -c 'import inspect, os, pluggy; print(os.path.dirname(inspect.getabsfile(pluggy)))')/py.typed"
scripts.format: prettier -w '.*/**/*.json' '.*/**/*.y*ml' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.y*ml' && poetry run isort . && poetry run yapf -ri docs xirvik .stubs tests
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn ruff && yarn rstcheck && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
